did.unittitle: Additional papers, 1897-1980 (inclusive), 1918-1980 (bulk)
did.abstract: Addenda to the papers (A-103) of the Alger family from New England, including correspondence, photographs and account books.

scopecontent.head: SCOPE AND CONTENT
scopecontent.p: Addenda to the papers (A-103) of the Alger family from New England, including correspondence, photographs and account books. There is additional related material at the Schlesinger Library. See Alger family Additional papers, 1809-1984 (inclusive), 1952-1981 (bulk) 84-M102, and Alger family Additional papers, 1919-1982 84-M45. Folders #20-31 for which original restrictions have expired were added to the collection in November 2009.
